explanation: Pen, Paper, Keyboard, and Typewriter are all direct tools or mediums used to create or record written text. A Microphone is used to capture audio, which can be transcribed into text, but it does not directly produce written content itself.

category: The Four Great Inventions of Ancient China
explanation: The first four items (Printing Press, Compass, Gunpowder, Papermaking) are traditionally known as the Four Great Inventions of Ancient China. The wheel is an ancient invention but is not one of these specific four.
Onion, Artichoke, Cabbage, and Lasagna are all typically composed of or consumed in distinct, visible layers. A Banana, while peeled, does not have such internal or structural layers.
